title: 【求助】Minecraft has crashed！ 等待大神。
author: AY_VIKING
txt_content:
试过了大神们给出的所有方法

下了无数个版本 ，装过几次JAVA，试过把MOD全禁用，电脑配置也绝对合格，给的内存也达到1024MB了....

再别的地方能玩，但在自己的电脑上，还是这样！！

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.




--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7cf3a456 --------
Generated 12-7-22 下午5:55

Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
Java: 1.6.0_24, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: GeForce GT 430/PCI/SSE2 version 4.1.0, NVIDIA Corporation

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Function is not supported
    at org.lwjgl.BufferChecks.checkFunctionAddress(BufferChecks.java:64)
    at org.lwjgl.opengl.GL11.glMatrixMode(GL11.java:2054)
    at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.v(SourceFile:356)
    at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(SourceFile:256)
    at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:657)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT c867dfe5 ----------

replies.author: Bruce.Owen
replies.txt_content: 目测是JAVA的问题。不是程序员，看不大明白{:10_514:}

replies.author: zhang0791
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 zhang0791 于 2013-3-30 15:18 编辑 

同学，不是JAVA的问题，客户端的问题，我的MOD报废了就这样，你在到MCBBS或者我的世界中文下载站就可以下到能用的啊
